00065 GrFramebuffer::GrFramebuffer( unsigned int width, unsigned int height, EGRQUALITY quality, bool hdrEnable )
00066 : _width( width )
00067 , _height( height )
00068 , _quality( quality )
00069 , _hdrFormat( GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA64F )
00070 , _hdrEnable( hdrEnable )
00071 {
00074         B_ASSERT( gGrFramebuffer == 0 );
00075         gGrFramebuffer = this;
00076 
00078         AllocResources();
00079 }

00093 GrRenderTargetMgr::EFORMAT
00094 GrFramebuffer::GetColorFormat() const
00095 {
00097         if ( _hdrRT && _hdrEnable )
00098                 return _hdrFormat;
00099 
00101         return GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA32;
00102 }

00125 //----------------------------------------------------------
00126 void
00127 GrFramebuffer::BeginFrame()
00128 {
00130         if ( _hdrRT && _hdrEnable )
00131                 _hdrRT->Bind();
00132         else
00133                 _mainRT->Bind();
00134 }
00135 
00136 //----------------------------------------------------------
00137 void
00138 GrFramebuffer::EndFrame( unsigned int time )
00139 {
00141         if ( _hdrRT && _hdrEnable )
00142         {
00144                 ToneMap( time - _lastTime );
00145         }
00146 
00148         _lastTime = time;
00149 }

00151 //----------------------------------------------------------
00152 URef< GrTextureBase >
00153 GrFramebuffer::CopyCurrentRender( int srcX, int srcY, int width, int height )
00154 {
00155         B_ASSERT( srcX >= 0 && srcY >= 0 && width > 0 && height > 0 );
00156 
00158         _currentRender->Bind( 0 );
00159         CHECK_GL();
00160 
00162         GrTextureRect* currentRender = GetTextureRect( _currentRender );
00163         B_ASSERT( currentRender->GetWidth() >= ( unsigned int )width );
00164         B_ASSERT( currentRender->GetHeight() >= ( unsigned int )height );
00165 
00166         bglCopyTexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, 0, 0, srcX, srcY, width, height );
00167         CHECK_GL();
00168 
00170         return _currentRender;
00171 }
00172

00180         _currentDepth->Bind( 0 );

00185         B_ASSERT( currentDepth->GetWidth() >= ( unsigned int )width );
00186         B_ASSERT( currentDepth->GetHeight() >= ( unsigned int )height );

00188         bglCopyTexSubImage2D( GL_TEXTURE_RECTANGLE_ARB, 0, 0, 0, srcX, srcY, width, height );
00189         CHECK_GL();

00192         return _currentDepth;
00193 }

00223 //----------------------------------------------------------
00224 void
00225 GrFramebuffer::ToneMap( unsigned int delta )
00226 {
00229         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( _squareRT->GetWidth() ) );
00230         B_ASSERT( _squareRT->GetWidth() == _squareRT->GetHeight() );
00231 
00233         GrSetState( 0 );
00234         GrSetWriteEnable( GR_RGBA );
00235 
00238         ProcessRT( _squareRT, _hdrLogAvgShader, _hdrRT, GL_LINEAR );
00239 
00242         GrRenderTarget* src = _squareRT;
00243         GrRenderTarget* dst = _halfSquareRT;
00244         unsigned int dim = _squareRT->GetWidth();
00245 
00247         unsigned int i = 1;
00248         while ( dim > 1 )
00249         {
00251                 ProcessRT( dst, _hdrPassThruShader, src, GL_LINEAR, i & ~1, ( i - 1 ) & ~1 );
00252 
00254                 Swap( src, dst );
00255                 dim >>= 1;
00256 
00258                 ++i;
00259         }
00260 
00262         GrTextureBase* lumTex = src->GetColorTex( 0 );
00263         B_ASSERT( lumTex );
00264         lumTex->Bind( 1, GL_NEAREST, GL_NEAREST, GL_CLAMP, GL_CLAMP );
00265 
00267         ProcessRT( _hdrScratch, _hdrToneMapShader, _hdrRT, GL_NEAREST );
00268 
00271         ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBrightPassShader, _hdrScratch, GL_LINEAR );
00272 
00274         _hdrBlurShader->Bind( _quality );
00275 
00277 
00279         _hdrBlurShader->SetUserParam4fv( kBlurVecHandle, kVertVec );
00280         ProcessRT( _downSampleRT2, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT, GL_LINEAR, 0, 0 );
00281 
00283         _hdrBlurShader->SetUserParam4fv( kBlurVecHandle, kHorzVec );
00284         ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT2, GL_LINEAR, 0, 0 );
00285 
00286 //      _hdrBlurShader->SetUserParam4fv( kBlurVecHandle, kVertVec );
00287 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT2, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT, GL_LINEAR, 1, 0 );
00288 //      _hdrBlurShader->SetUserParam4fv( kBlurVecHandle, kHorzVec );
00289 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT2, GL_LINEAR, 0, 1 );
00290 
00291 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT2, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT, GL_LINEAR, 1, 0 );
00292 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT2, GL_LINEAR, 0, 1 );
00293 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT2, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT, GL_LINEAR, 1, 0 );
00294 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT2, GL_LINEAR, 0, 1 );
00295 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT2, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT, GL_LINEAR, 1, 0 );
00296 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT2, GL_LINEAR, 0, 1 );
00297 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT2, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT, GL_LINEAR, 1, 0 );
00298 //      ProcessRT( _downSampleRT, _hdrBlurShader, _downSampleRT2, GL_LINEAR, 0, 1 );
00299 
00300         _mainRT->Bind();
00301 
00303         BindRTRectTex( 1, GL_LINEAR, _downSampleRT );
00304 //      GrTextureBase* bloomTex = _downSampleRT->GetColorTex( 0 );
00305 //      B_ASSERT( bloomTex );
00306 //      bloomTex->Bind( 1, GL_LINEAR, GL_LINEAR, GL_CLAMP, GL_CLAMP );
00307 
00309 
00310 
00312         ProcessRT( _mainRT, _hdrCombineShader, _hdrScratch, GL_NEAREST );
00313 }

00315 //----------------------------------------------------------
00316 void
00317 GrFramebuffer::ProcessRT( GrRenderTarget* destRT, GrShader* shader, GrRenderTarget* sourceRT, GLenum filter,
00318                                                   unsigned int vpSizeShift, unsigned int srcShift )
00319 {
00321         B_ASSERT( sourceRT != destRT );
00322 
00324         destRT->Bind( vpSizeShift == 0 );
00325         if ( vpSizeShift )
00326                 GrViewport( 0, 0, destRT->GetWidth() >> vpSizeShift, destRT->GetHeight() >> vpSizeShift );
00327 
00329         shader->Bind( _quality );
00330 
00332         SetTexCoordScale( shader, kTexCoordScaleHandle, sourceRT, srcShift );
00333 
00335         BindRTRectTex( 0, filter, sourceRT );
00336 //      GrTextureBase* srcTex = sourceRT->GetColorTex( 0 );
00337 //      B_ASSERT( srcTex );
00338 //      srcTex->Bind( 0, filter, filter, GL_CLAMP, GL_CLAMP );
00339 
00341         gGrRenderUtil->DrawScreenQuad();
00342 //      GrDrawScreenQuad( GR_ATTRIB_TEXCOORD_INDEX );
00343 }

00345 //----------------------------------------------------------
00346 void
00347 GrFramebuffer::BindRTRectTex( GLenum texUnit, GLenum filter, URef< GrRenderTarget > renderTarget )
00348 {
00349         B_ASSERT( texUnit < 16 );
00350         GrTextureBase* srcTex = renderTarget->GetColorTex( 0 );
00351         B_ASSERT( srcTex );
00352         srcTex->Bind( texUnit, filter, filter, GL_CLAMP, GL_CLAMP );
00353 }

00355 //----------------------------------------------------------
00356 void
00357 GrFramebuffer::SetTexCoordScale( GrShader* shader, unsigned int paramHandle, GrRenderTarget* sourceRT,
00358                                                                  unsigned int sizeShift )
00359 {
00361         float kUVScale[ 4 ] = {
00362                 ( float )( sourceRT->GetWidth() >> sizeShift ),
00363                 ( float )( sourceRT->GetHeight() >> sizeShift ),
00364                 0.0f,
00365                 0.0f
00366         };
00367         shader->SetUserParam4fv( paramHandle, kUVScale );
00368 }

00370 //----------------------------------------------------------
00371 void
00372 GrFramebuffer::AllocResources( bool allocShaders )
00373 {
00374         B_ASSERT( _currentRender == 0 );
00375 
00377         static unsigned int kMaxRes = 2048;
00378 
00380         _mainRT = gGrRenderTargetMgr->GetPrimaryRenderTarget();
00381 
00384         bool hdrEnable = _hdrEnable;
00385         if ( _width < 4 || _height < 4 )
00386                 hdrEnable = false;
00387 
00389         unsigned int widthPow2 = FindPow2( _width );
00390         unsigned int heightPow2 = FindPow2( _height );
00391 
00393         if ( hdrEnable )
00394                 _hdrRT = CreateHDRRenderTarget( _width, _height, true );
00395 
00396         if ( _hdrRT && hdrEnable )
00397         {
00399                 {
00400                         unsigned int squareDim = Max( widthPow2, heightPow2 );
00401                         _hdrScratch             = CreateHDRRenderTarget( _width, _height, false );
00402                         _downSampleRT   = CreateHDRRenderTarget( _width >> 1, _height >> 1, false );
00403                         _downSampleRT2  = CreateHDRRenderTarget( _width >> 1, _height >> 1, false );
00404                         _squareRT               = CreateHDRRenderTarget( squareDim >> 1, squareDim >> 1, false );
00405                         _halfSquareRT   = CreateHDRRenderTarget( squareDim >> 2, squareDim >> 2, false );
00406                 }
00407 
00409                 {
00411                         _currentRender = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRendertexture( _width, _height,
00412                                 GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA64F, GrTexture::kNoMipMap, GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT );
00413                         CHECK_GL();
00414 
00416                         _currentDepth = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRendertexture( _width, _height,
00417                                         GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_DEPTH, GrTexture::kNoMipMap, GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT );
00418                         CHECK_GL();
00419                 }
00420 
00422                 if ( allocShaders )
00423                 {
00425                         _hdrPassThruShader = gGrShaderMgr->GetShader( "HDR/PassThru" );
00426                         _hdrPassThruShader->InitUserParam( "u_TexCoordScale", kTexCoordScaleHandle );
00427                         _hdrPassThruShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentRender", 0 );
00428 
00430                         _hdrLogAvgShader = gGrShaderMgr->GetShader( "HDR/CalcLum" );
00431                         _hdrLogAvgShader->InitUserParam( "u_TexCoordScale", kTexCoordScaleHandle );
00432                         _hdrLogAvgShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentRender", 0 );
00433 
00435                         _hdrToneMapShader = gGrShaderMgr->GetShader( "HDR/ToneMap" );
00436                         _hdrToneMapShader->InitUserParam( "u_TexCoordScale", kTexCoordScaleHandle );
00437                         _hdrToneMapShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentRender", 0 );
00438                         _hdrToneMapShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentLum", 1 );
00439 
00441                         _hdrBrightPassShader = gGrShaderMgr->GetShader( "HDR/BrightPass" );
00442                         _hdrBrightPassShader->InitUserParam( "u_TexCoordScale", kTexCoordScaleHandle );
00443                         _hdrBrightPassShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentRender", 0 );
00444 
00446                         _hdrBlurShader = gGrShaderMgr->GetShader( "HDR/Blur" );
00447                         _hdrBlurShader->InitUserParam( "u_TexCoordScale", kTexCoordScaleHandle );
00448                         _hdrBlurShader->InitUserParam( "u_BlurVec", kBlurVecHandle );
00449                         _hdrBlurShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentRender", 0 );
00450 
00452                         _hdrCombineShader = gGrShaderMgr->GetShader( "HDR/Combine" );
00453                         _hdrCombineShader->InitUserParam( "u_TexCoordScale", kTexCoordScaleHandle );
00454                         _hdrCombineShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentRender", 0 );
00455                         _hdrCombineShader->BindUserSampler( "s_CurrentBloom", 1 );
00456                 }
00457         }
00458         else
00459         {
00461                 _currentRender = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRendertexture( _width, _height,
00462                         GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA32, GrTexture::kNoMipMap, GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT );
00463                 CHECK_GL();
00464 
00466                 _currentDepth = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRendertexture( _width, _height,
00467                                 GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_DEPTH, GrTexture::kNoMipMap, GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT );
00468                 CHECK_GL();
00469         }
00470 }
00471 
00472 //----------------------------------------------------------
00473 URef< GrRenderTarget >
00474 GrFramebuffer::CreateHDRRenderTarget( unsigned int width, unsigned int height, bool depthBuffer )
00475 {
00477         URef< GrTextureBase > hdrTex = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRendertexture( width, height,
00478                 GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_RGBA64F, GrTexture::kNoMipMap, GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT );
00479 
00481         URef< GrRenderbuffer > depth = 0;
00482         if ( depthBuffer )
00483                 depth = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRenderbuffer( width, height, GrRenderTargetMgr::EF_DEPTHSTENCIL );
00484 
00486         URef< GrRenderTarget > newTarget = gGrRenderTargetMgr->CreateRenderTarget( hdrTex, depth );
00487         return newTarget;
00488 }

00496 GrTextureRect*
00497 GetTextureRect( GrTextureBase* texture )
00498 {
00499         B_ASSERT( texture->GetType() == GrTextureBase::ETT_RECT );
00500         return ( ( GrTextureRect* )( GrTextureBase* )texture );
00501 }
